website_summaries.verdict: A zippy little trike that won't break the bank, but with a smaller size and lower weight capacity, it might not be for everyone.
pros: Fun and easy enough for both teenagers and adults to operate
Capable of reaching up to 22 miles per hour and runs for around 20 to 22 miles
Can be ridden either sitting or standing
cons: Small wheels work best on hard, even surfaces
Quick acceleration takes some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty Trike but the instructions SUCKS!! Had to go to UTube and still wasn't to clear. Worked on it for several hours and didn't have the strap for the basket. The fender should have been metal not plastic. It will not go on straight at all. This is for our granddaughter that has cerebal palsy and can't ride a regular bike because if her balance issue. She is turning 10 and has never rode a bike or anything. I hope this works for her. It's alot if money when you don't have it to give. I sure hope she is not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PAULA

customer_reviews.title: Changing My Review
customer_reviews.text: Used 5 Months Batteries bad replaced and there was a wiring problem. The guy that repaired it said the wires were reversed at the Factory or where it was assembled. The wiring in the box was wired and there was 2 electrical tape where it had been reassembled or something Factory would not use electrical tape iin a newly made Trike. I called the repairman in Vegas and he said it would cost more to repair it That I should buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: super fast and fun
customer_reviews.text: First, it actually is an upgrade from the 1 pictured: has slightly larger front tire and goes faster than 22mph, have clocked at 30+. Second, these scooters were never meant to have a seat, designed to be ridden standing; seat puts weight to rear and high up, can flip backwards or to either side when turning. Also, the motor in the front wheel will not have proper traction with weight on rear. Standing gives you better balance and traction. This is my 3rd, second MotoTec. It is recreational and can ride it anywhere you ride a bicycle, etc.
customer_reviews.author: krakerjm

customer_reviews.title: Buy One You Will Love It
customer_reviews.text: I received this trike as described and let me tell you that it is beautiful...assembling this bike may be a challenge but if you go to U tube you will have no problem with the assembly...I had a noise problem when riding the trike forward but the customer service is out standing and solved this matter in a few days...I highly recommend this product and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: RICHIERICH36

customer_reviews.title: I would give a five star, if the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: I would give a five star, if the battery case wasn't cracked and left rear tire innertube was assembled incorrectly and revealed a 1/2 inch cut. Why not make the rear wheels solid, I don't think that the ride would be that uncomfortable. With a wrench I had to stand on the handle to loosen the wheel nut. I'm sure that the company has heard of a torque wrench. The battery wire harness created another problem
customer_reviews.author: Anton Hilchey

customer_reviews.title: looks great but be very careful
customer_reviews.text: flips over backwards if now careful...looks great but be very careful... needs longer wheelie bars...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K.

customer_reviews.title: love this Trike!!
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if front wheel had better traction but over all I love this it gets me around throttle takes a little getting used to but it's not a problem! Just ease the throttle very slowly to start moving! It is fast and easy to maneuver great in the stores and not a snail! I'm too young for my wheel chair! This is much better than my power chair smaller lighter and faster!
customer_reviews.author: Ladyfrog

customer_reviews.title: Tire safety, will need to replace them, an expense we did not plan on.
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving our 2 trikes the batteries were dislocated from there brackets on both and in process caused damage to the floor board on one of the units. One front tire has a separation causing trike to wobble and 1 rear tire has a bulge in the center of the tread. Trike does not have a brake lock, not a rear light, both safety issues. Tires spin a lot, need better gripping tires, such as knobby type tires for better traction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all a good product
customer_reviews.text: The box came completely damaged and looked like it obviously had been opened before, After spending hours trying to put this together there was the basket missing. The instructions are horrible. Also the description is untrue this trike should not be used for elderly people to get around. It’s dangerous and tips and has horrible traction!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitzi Scott

customer_reviews.title: Mighty scooter
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome ran great. Will last all day , would not be with out one
customer_reviews.author: N Jones

customer_reviews.title: and I'm very happy with the battery life
customer_reviews.text: I use it on flat parking lots for car shows, and I'm very happy with the battery life .
customer_reviews.author: Albert Kirschman

customer_reviews.title: NO SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: did not include fuse to run, had to guess what size, have a clunking inside rear wheel. BUT it runs fine
customer_reviews.author: ray  b

customer_reviews.title: Great trike!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this trike. We own 2 of these and it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tank 560

customer_reviews.title: Electric Trike
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time and in excellent condition. It was easy to put together and it didn't take long to do it. I enjoy riding it and so does my roommate. I haven't taken it outside yet because of the weather. I plan to as soon as it is nice. My grandson has rode this and he loves it. He plans on coming over on spring break to ride it around. I would buy it again. My room mate wants one now.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Eckard

customer_reviews.title: VERY DANGEROUS TIPS OVer back wards
customer_reviews.text: will not climb a12% driway.I weigh 190 lbs. went over back wards landing on me. I sent it back .
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nunes

customer_reviews.title: it is fast
customer_reviews.text: easy to put togeth i love it having fun ridy i will be buying one more the old man has wheels
customer_reviews.author: dallas watson

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SCOOTER A+A+
customer_reviews.text: I love my scooter it is very nice and easy to use I'm able to get out and do things again
customer_reviews.author: Susan B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice I love mine alot
customer_reviews.text: Yes I love it it's great for car shows and Drag races
customer_reviews.author: Carl Aleshire Jr.

customer_reviews.title: From china and a piece of junk. Manufactured wrong.
customer_reviews.text: It was manufactured wrong. The handle that went into the base was round, the base was square. The battery was 2 years old already and out of warranty. What a piece of junk!!
customer_reviews.author: William H. Short

customer_reviews.title: Good for the right application
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was challenging because the instructions don't seem to be for this model. It's hard to tell because they are written in broken English. It won't work on gravel or grass. It does fine on sidewalks and driveways. The front tire burns out easily and the turning radius is dangerously small. I could see this thing flipping at full speed. It will be great to help my wife get around until her broken ankle is fully healed. I'll use it to check the mail. This scooter isn't for children. I'd bet on a kid ending up at the emergency room if they were to ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Keifenheim

customer_reviews.title: Help with Replacement Charger
customer_reviews.text: Is it possible that one of you owners take a picture of your charger for me. My wife purchased this as a Christmas present, but she inadvertently threw away the charger. I need to purchase a replacement charger and want to ensure I get the correct one; there are numerous 48v chargers with different amperage ratings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have this scooter..I love it..does not go on grass or gravel..I live near a shopping center and it's great to travel on sidewalks..parking lots..and in the stores..it can go fast.so be careful..I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Connie Bruss

customer_reviews.title: not cool!
customer_reviews.text: This does NOT...NOT... come with a charger!!!!! The two other ones we bought did....not cool!
customer_reviews.author: mitch wyman

customer_reviews.title: Bad Control Module
customer_reviews.text: Control module defective. Still have not received the new one as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gorden

product_meta.title: MotoTec Electric Trike 48V 500W
product_meta.description: The MotoTec electric powered trike aka personal transporter is a three wheel electric scooter that you can ride while sitting or standing, This makes it very convenient for use at events, security and warehouse floor operations or for just plain fun! It's like a three wheel Segway but at a fraction of the price! Powered by a 500 watt front wheel hub motor with speeds of 22 miles per hour. It can achieve a 20 plus mile range on a full charge. It features a 16" Pneumatic front tire, two 9" Pneumatic rear tires and a removable seat. This personal transporter is easy-to-operate with a twist throttle and left handle front drum brake system. Comes standard with key, battery meter light, front LED head light and carrying basket. Specs: motor power: 500 Watt brushless hub motor battery: four 12V 12Ah batteries (48V total) Max weight capacity: 240 lbs. Recommended age: 13 and up charger included Battery life: over 300 charges rated speed: 22 mph (weight dependant) range per charge: 20-25 miles* recharge time: 4-8hrs climbing ability: 10 degrees seat: wide saddle front wheel diameter: 16 inch air filled tires rear tires diameter: 2.80/2.50-4 inch air filled tires (9 inch tall) shipping weight: 100 lbs shipping carton size: 34x32x20 inches scooter weight: 93 lbs scooter dimensions: Length: 41 inches, Width: 28 inches, height: 50 inches ground clearance: 2 inches
